text: SMH may refer to: ==Education== * Saint Mary's Hall (San Antonio), a school in Texas, US * SMH School, Khatangi, rural Bihar, India * Stonyhurst Saint Mary's Hall, a school in Lancashire, England ==Hospitals== * Sarasota Memorial Hospital, Florida, US * Strong Memorial Hospital, Rochester, New York, US * Surrey Memorial Hospital, British Columbia, Canada ==Businesses== * SMH Books, Arundel, West Sussex, England * The Sydney Morning Herald, an Australian newspaper ==Other== * Samei language of Yunnan, China, ISO 639 code * "Shaking my head" in SMS language ==See also== * SMHS (disambiguation)
title: SMH
